name: Torony
description:
In this game you're testing the new Remote Base Defence System. You have to defend the island from the invaders, while waiting for the factory to produce ore containers, which then can be transported. If you manage to send 3 containers before the island is captured by the enemy, you win.

I made this game more like as a prototype than an actual game. It has a few bugs and doesn't look so good, because this is my first time making a 3D game with Godot. It also largely lacks sound and has no music.

Tools used:

  • Game Engine - Godot 3.1 beta
  • Models - Blender
  • Sound - Audacity
